Name: AI Weather - All Sky Camera Monitor
Author: Michele Bergo

short.EN: AI-powered all-sky camera weather monitoring with automatic safety protection

long.EN: Analyzes all-sky camera images using AI vision models to determine real-time weather conditions including cloud coverage, rain, and fog detection. Supports three capture modes (RTSP stream, HTTP image download, folder watch) and five AI providers (Local offline, GitHub Models, OpenAI, Google Gemini, Anthropic Claude). Integrates with NINA's safety monitor to automatically pause or abort imaging sequences when conditions become unsafe. Features automatic fallback to local analysis if cloud AI providers fail, optional ASCOM Generic File SafetyMonitor output, and a live preview panel with real-time activity logging.

Changes: Safety status file now writes plain Safe/Unsafe for ASCOM Generic File SafetyMonitor compatibility
Fixed CI workflow installer URL to include version in filename for manifest validation
Dynamic AI model discovery: all providers now query live APIs for available vision models with 1-hour cache and automatic fallback to defaults
Expanded supported vision models: added GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1-mini, GPT-4.1-nano, o1, o3, o4-mini, Claude Sonnet 4.5
Updated default models: OpenAI gpt-4o, Google gemini-2.0-flash, Anthropic claude-sonnet-4-5
Model refresh button and status now visible for all cloud AI providers (not just GitHub Models)
Fixed capture mode propagation bug: switching modes in Options now correctly updates the preview panel
Improved settings reliability: removed Settings.Default.Reload() calls that could revert in-memory changes
Added 60-second timeout to all AI analysis providers to prevent indefinite hangs
Enhanced logging throughout AI analysis pipeline for better debugging
Improved error handling with separate timeout exception catching
Added automatic fallback to local analysis when AI providers timeout or fail
Added HTTP Image Download mode (INDICamera) support
Added Folder Watch mode for monitoring local image directories
Fixed background monitoring persistence for HTTP and Folder modes
Implemented image persistence and UI state restoration when navigating between pages
Enhanced logging with detailed capture mode information
Fixed Play/Stop button visibility for all capture modes
Initial release
RTSP stream monitoring
AI-powered weather analysis
Safety Monitor integration
GitHub Models support
